headline: Chipotle  Is Fined $1.4 Million In Work Case
abstract: Massachusetts said Chipotle let teenagers work too many hours per week and too late on school nights. The chain settled without admitting to the estimated 13,000 violations.
lead_paragraph: Faced with a mounting labor shortage and high employee turnover, restaurant chains have earned plaudits for offering incentives to workers to stay in the job longer â€” tuition payments, bonuses, even a four-day workweek.
